did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Punk and underground music related magazines and fanzines. Also files on bands and punk venues that include flyers, posters, and other ephemera. The remainder of the collection, which includes 500 LP, 45, and CD recordings, along with approximately 100 related books have been cataloged individually.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Punk and underground music related magazines and fanzines. Also files on bands and punk venues that include flyers, posters, and other ephemera. The remainder of the collection, which includes 500 LP, 45, and CD recordings, along with approximately 100 related books have been cataloged individually.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Geoffrey Weiss Punk Collection, #8054. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

emph.ref: Series II. Band and Record Label Files
Series V. Sound and Video Recordings

scopecontent.p: BOB 4; 7" flexi accompanying Bucketfull of Brains no. 10
No. 53; Australian Punk and Post-Punk Record and Tape Discography

did.unittitle: Los Angeles Phonograph Record Magazine, The

scopecontent.p: Includes flyers, clippings, press packs, photographs, and other promotional materials.
Concert poster with Adolescents, D.O.A., and Minutemen at the Santa Monica Civic
Contains production cost estimates and artwork for the "Flipper Twist" single.
Includes advertising rates for Slash magazine and promotional planning for X's "Los Angeles" LP.
Includes documents and promotional materials for Bug Radio, Music View, New Route, and Rap Down!
Includes advertisements for fanzines and record stores and a "Vote for Nobody" political flyer.

did.unittitle: Recording Heathen Earth, Live at Oundle School
